name: imdb_scrape_top250
description: Scrape the IMDb Top 250 movies list. Returns ranked movies with title, year, rating, vote count, and URL.

steps.code: const movies = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="ipc-metadata-list-summary-item"], .chart tbody tr, [class*="lister-list"] tr'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 50); i++) { const el = items[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h3, [class*="title"] a, td.titleColumn a'); const yearEl = el.querySelector('[class*="year"], [class*="secondary"], td.titleColumn span'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, td.ratingColumn strong, [class*="ipc-rating-star"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/title/"]'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img'); movies.push({ rank: i + 1, title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', year: yearEl ? yearEl.textContent.trim().replace(/[()]/g, '') : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } return { list: 'IMDb Top 250', movie_count: movies.length, movies: movies, url: window.location.href }
